com.lightattachment
Class MailSet

java.lang.Object
  com.lightattachment.MailSet

public class MailSet
extends java.lang.Object

Hold precious information about a message. This is used all along the message processing to refer to the real message which is on the disk and never in memory.

Version:
0.1a
Author:
Benoit Giannangeli

Field Summary
private  boolean clean
          true if must be removed from disk.
private  java.lang.String from
          Message envelope from.
private  boolean fromFile
          true if must be injected back from files.
private  javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage message
          The final message without attachment.

          The original message ID.
private  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> originalMessages
          Contains original messages file names.
private  java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parts
          Contains references to the attachment files.
private  boolean sent
          When set to true, the MailSet is pushedToClean (deleted).
private  java.lang.String to
          Message envelope to.

Field Detail

messageID

private java.lang.String messageID
The original message ID. Set to StreamedMailParser.STOP to stop LightAttachment components.

message

private javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage message
The final message without attachment.

from

private java.lang.String from
Message envelope from.

to

private java.lang.String to
Message envelope to.

sent

private boolean sent
When set to true, the MailSet is pushedToClean (deleted).

fromFile

private boolean fromFile
true if must be injected back from files.

clean

private boolean clean
true if must be removed from disk.

parts

private java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parts
Contains references to the attachment files. Couples of real file name - original file name.

originalMessages

private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> originalMessages
Contains original messages file names. Used if the message is too small, too large or failed to be saved.

public MailSet()

MailSet

public MailSet(java.lang.String id,
               java.lang.String from,
               java.lang.String to,
               boolean partial)
Build a MailSet.

Parameters:
id - the message id.
from - the message from envelope.
to - the message to envelope.
partial - true if the message has been sent in several message/partial mails.

MailSet

               javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage message,
               java.lang.String from,
               java.lang.String to)
Build a MailSet.

Parameters:
id - the message id.
message - the modified message.
from - the message from envelope.
to - the message to envelope.
